# Create a report from the saved query

Learn how to create a report from the saved query

To create a report from the saved query, perform these steps.

1.  Navigate to Reporting > Reporting in the left navigation menu.
2.  Click the dropdown button ![dropdown button.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/e873e18f-fd3c-43a6-84d1-73bcb971b0f1?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..QmwxBm2Iwe169UYAV2SCYSUi3kyZwkBzvaftiaSkRiU) to the right of \+ Create New Report , and then click Create report from saved query . ![create report from saved query.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/1cc82245-9ed3-4fcb-a729-f3cf69c095dd?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..wYkC3ufREzwkPJtdrzTYrXgcs_o2D_d6aUsZBJxRvjY) The “Saved data queries” page opens, presenting all saved data queries in your tenant.
3.  Click Select in the Action column to select the query you just saved.
4.  Build and preview the report. For more information, see [Build and preview the report](/zuora-platform/data/reporting/use-reporting/create-a-summary-report#concept-retjrr5i__title-614). When building the report, you can use fields in the query results.
5.  Run and view the report. For more information, see [Run and view the report](/zuora-platform/data/reporting/use-reporting/create-a-summary-report#concept-retjrr5i__title-1469).

    For more information about using saved data queries in Reporting, see [Create a report from saved data queries](/zuora-platform/data/reporting/use-reporting/create-a-report-from-saved-data-queries).
